subject: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham From South Carolina, I am a banker , the
Accountant Manager of Trust Bank in Phoenix Arizona, USA. A wealthy
Bank Client. A National of your country who have passed away during
the Covid 19 Pandemic in the 4th day of March 2020 here in Phoenix
Arizona USA. He died leaving the sum of $115,000,000.00 (One hundred
and fifteen million USA.
I am contacting you today since you bear the same last name with my
late client. I want to present you as the next of kin of my late
client so that the sum of $115 million dollars and properties left My
late client will be handed over to you as the next of kin for our
mutual benefits, I don't want the government of my country to cease
the funds and declare it UN-serviceable by the owner. I also want you
to understand that the essence of life is to make money and be helpful
to others in need. In addition to this, this fund will be of great
benefit to you and I, that's the reason why I am contacting you today
for your full consent to have this executed for our mutual benefits
where I will have you presented as the family member. since you bear
the same last name with my late client. I made my decision to contact
you regarding this very transaction because I'm convinced you are
trust worthy to be my partner on this.
1. The sum of $115million dollars will be transferred into your
account after the processing of all relevant legal documents with your
name as the next of kin. The transfer will be made by telegraphic
Transfer T/T Conformable in 2 banking days.
2. This deal must be kept secret forever between both of us for
security purposes
3. There should be no third parties
4. You will be entitled to 50% while 50% comes to me.
Best regards!
Sheri Cunningham.
Head of management office,
Trust bank,
Phoenix Arizona United States

subject: Re:   I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello Ms. Sheri Cunningham,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your client, especially during these challenging times. It's quite a surprise to learn that we share the same last name.

I must admit, this is an unusual situation and I have a few questions if you don't mind. How did you find my contact information? And how can we proceed with this without violating any laws or regulations?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Thank you for your reply, please are you on Skype application so we can
chat there for easy communication?

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello! I appreciate your suggestion, but I'm afraid I can't use Skype at the moment. However, we can continue our conversation here. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss?

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
I’m Sheri Cunningham A Banker, I was and still remain the account officer
of my late Client Mr Reyes Colin. A National of your country who have
passed away during the Covid 19 Pandemic in the 4th day of March 2020 here
in Phoenix Arizona USA with his family that claimed so many lives and until
his death he never wrote a will. He died leaving the sum of $115,000,000.00
(One hundred and fifteen million USA.

I am contacting you today since you bear the same last name with my late
client. I want to present you as the next of kin of my late client so that
the sum of $115,000,000.00 (One hundred and fifteen million USA and
properties left behind by my late client will be handed over to you as the
next of kin for our mutual benefits, I don't want the government of my
country to cease the funds and declare it UN-serviceable by the owner. I
also want you to understand that the essence of life is to make money and
be helpful to others in need.


In addition to this,this fund will be of great benefit to you and I, that's
the reason why I am contacting you today for your full consent to have this
executed for our mutual benefits where I will have you presented as since
you bear same last name with my late client to his personal attorney. I
made my decision to contact you regarding this very transaction because I'm
convinced you are trust worthy to be my partner on this.


My conditions:

1. The sum of $115,000,000.00 (One hundred and fifteen million USA will be
transferred into your account after the processing of all relevant legal
documents with your name as the next of kin. The transfer will be made by
telegraphic Transfer T/T Conformable in 2 banking days.

2. This deal must be kept secret forever between both of us for security
purposes

3. There should be no third parties

4. You will be entitled to 50% while 50% comes to me.


If you AGREE with my conditions, l advise you to send the following details:

Full Names....

Age...

Address.....

Nationality...

Occupation.....

Marital Status.....

Your WhatsApp phone number…..

Your google chat email address…….

Copy of your passport or Driver's license.

I'm waiting for your reply as soon as possible
Best regard

SHERI CUNNINGHAM.

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello Sheri,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea I had a relative named Mr. Reyes Colin. It's sad to hear about his passing due to the pandemic. 

I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about Mr. Reyes Colin? Like what was his profession and how did he amass such a large fortune? Also, could you explain why the government would seize the funds?

I'm also curious about the legal process involved in transferring such a large sum of money. What kind of documents would need to be processed? And how long might that take?

Lastly, you mentioned that this deal must be kept secret forever for security purposes. Could you elaborate on why that is necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Now, before I will continue to give you more detailed information, I want
you to understand the merits of this transaction. It is not risky on your
own part, but very risky for me because it would cost me my job if you
betray me by leaking this secret. This has to be between just you and me
and if exposed to an outsider it would cost me my reputation that took me
years to build which is most important to me. Therefore, I would ask for
your  cooperation in full to keep this transaction very confidential and if
in any way you can not keep this transaction a secret tell me now,so I had
better call it off with you.

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I understand the importance of keeping this matter confidential and I assure you that your secret is safe with me. However, could you please provide more details about what exactly this involves? I would like to fully comprehend the situation before we proceed further.

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
As a matter of urgency you have to send to the following information to
enable my attorney proceed on the documentation:


Before we proceed, I will like to have some of your informations to prove
that I know everything about you once the lawyer aasked.

Full Names....

Age...

Address.....

Nationality...

Occupation.....

Marital Status.....

Your WhatsApp phone number…..

Your google chat email address…….

Copy of your passport or Driver's license.


With this we will proceed without any further delay.

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity and can't wait to proceed further. However, I'm a bit confused about why you need all these details. Could you please explain how my personal information like age, marital status, phone number, and passport or driver's license will be used in this process? 

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Please dear I don’t need such questions if you don’t want to proceed then
you leave it thanks.

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your response. I'm just trying to understand things better, you know? Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what we were discussing?

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't share my personal contact information. But we can continue our conversation here! So, what's the next topic you'd like to discuss?

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body: If you can’t send the information I requested no need to proceed any further

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Hello there! I'm glad to be in touch with you. Could you please clarify what exactly you're requesting? I'd be happy to help as much as I can, but remember, I won't be able to share any personal information.

Best wishes,
Colin

subject: Re: I'm Ms. Sheri Cunningham Fro
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't share my personal contact information. But we can continue our conversation here! What else would you like to know?
